input.sentences: i recently went to a farmers market to buy fresh food for my dinner party
i purchased some extra virgin olive oil to sautee some vegetables
my dinner guests were quite impressed with my dinner
they were anxious to see what was coming out next
i prepared a fresh salad for my guests and they were all amazed at my cooking skills
output.sentences: Recently, there was a party at the market.
The extra virgin oil sautees the vegetables.
They were anxious of the coming guests.
The skilled chef prepared the salad.
